tracking.googleAnalyticsFour.propertyID.title: Google Analytics 4 ID
tracking.googleAnalyticsFour.propertyID.description: Enter the Google Analytics 4 Tracking ID. SuiteCommerce Advanced inserts this property into each page of the application. To locate the tracking ID, login to your Google Analytics 4 account and go to Admin > Data Streams > select your data stream > MEASUREMENT ID.

tracking.googleAnalyticsFour.domainName.title: Google Analytics 4 domain
tracking.googleAnalyticsFour.domainName.description: Enter the domain used for Google Analytics. The value you enter depends on which application you want to use Google Analytics

tracking.googleAnalyticsFour.domainNameS.title: Google Analytics 4 secure domain
tracking.googleAnalyticsFour.domainNameS.description: Enter the secure domain used for Google Analytics 4. Possible values are the same as the Google Analytics Domain property.
